name: Library of Magical Tomes
longDesc: The library is large with many bookshelves filled with old books.  There are several tables and chairs scattered throughout. In the center of the room there is a table with a lamp, an open book rests there under the light. Behind the table on the far wall, a large window set several feet from the floor streams sunlight.
shortDesc: A library filled with books. There are several tables and chairs scattered throughout. On the far wall is a large window.
